headers.value: default-src 'self' vercel.app *.vercel.app *.up.railway.app data:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' vercel.app *.vercel.app *.up.railway.app; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' vercel.app *.vercel.app; font-src 'self' data: vercel.app *.vercel.app; img-src 'self' data: vercel.app *.vercel.app; connect-src 'self' vercel.app *.vercel.app *.up.railway.app;
